mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, t_name, t_schoolid, t_grade, t_term, qr_code, t_student, t_flowers, t_image, tea_name, tea_image, tea_sign, t_slogan, writes, readings, readalouds, t_open, rankings from u_teacher where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into u_teacher(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, t_name, t_schoolid, t_grade, t_term, qr_code, t_student, t_flowers, t_image, tea_name, tea_image, tea_sign, t_slogan, writes, readings, readalouds, t_open, rankings) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{tName}, #{tSchoolid}, #{tGrade}, #{tTerm}, #{qrCode}, #{tStudent}, #{tFlowers}, #{tImage}, #{teaName}, #{teaImage}, #{teaSign}, #{tSlogan}, #{writes}, #{readings}, #{readalouds}, #{tOpen}, #{rankings})

insert into u_teacher(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, t_name, t_schoolid, t_grade, t_term, qr_code, t_student, t_flowers, t_image, tea_name, tea_image, tea_sign, t_slogan, writes, readings, readalouds, t_open, rankings) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.tName}, #{entity.tSchoolid}, #{entity.tGrade}, #{entity.tTerm}, #{entity.qrCode}, #{entity.tStudent}, #{entity.tFlowers}, #{entity.tImage}, #{entity.teaName}, #{entity.teaImage}, #{entity.teaSign}, #{entity.tSlogan}, #{entity.writes}, #{entity.readings}, #{entity.readalouds}, #{entity.tOpen}, #{entity.rankings})

insert into u_teacher(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, t_name, t_schoolid, t_grade, t_term, qr_code, t_student, t_flowers, t_image, tea_name, tea_image, tea_sign, t_slogan, writes, readings, readalouds, t_open, rankings) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.tName}, #{entity.tSchoolid}, #{entity.tGrade}, #{entity.tTerm}, #{entity.qrCode}, #{entity.tStudent}, #{entity.tFlowers}, #{entity.tImage}, #{entity.teaName}, #{entity.teaImage}, #{entity.teaSign}, #{entity.tSlogan}, #{entity.writes}, #{entity.readings}, #{entity.readalouds}, #{entity.tOpen}, #{entity.rankings})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), t_name = values(t_name), t_schoolid = values(t_schoolid), t_grade = values(t_grade), t_term = values(t_term), qr_code = values(qr_code), t_student = values(t_student), t_flowers = values(t_flowers), t_image = values(t_image), tea_name = values(tea_name), tea_image = values(tea_image), tea_sign = values(tea_sign), t_slogan = values(t_slogan), writes = values(writes), readings = values(readings), readalouds = values(readalouds), t_open = values(t_open), rankings = values(rankings)
mapper.update:
update u_teacher
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
t_name = #{tName},
t_schoolid = #{tSchoolid},
t_grade = #{tGrade},
t_term = #{tTerm},
qr_code = #{qrCode},
t_student = #{tStudent},
t_flowers = #{tFlowers},
t_image = #{tImage},
tea_name = #{teaName},
tea_image = #{teaImage},
tea_sign = #{teaSign},
t_slogan = #{tSlogan},
writes = #{writes},
readings = #{readings},
readalouds = #{readalouds},
t_open = #{tOpen},
rankings = #{rankings},
where id = #{id}
